title: Divine Diamond Kasulaperu Haaram with Emerald and Ruby Detailing
materials: 18K Yellow Gold with White Gold accents
features: A contemporary take on the classic Kasulaperu Haaram. Exquisite filigree work accented with shimmering diamonds creates a delicate, lace-like effect. Features a central Emerald and a lower Ruby, both pear-cut, adding vibrant color and focal points. Dangling cultured pearls add a touch of elegance. The secure and stylish mesh chain ensures comfortable wear.
occasions: and special celebrations. Its elegant design also makes it suitable for upscale evening events and formal gatherings.
description: This Haaram beautifully blends tradition with modern aesthetics. The brilliant cut diamonds create incredible sparkle, while the addition of Emerald and Ruby adds a touch of regal charm and auspiciousness. The high-quality craftsmanship ensures lasting beauty, making it a cherished heirloom. The contrasting colors symbolize prosperity, love, and happiness.
